mapper.select: select t.* from( select g.*,d.fileName from MOVIE_DETAILS g, movie_detail_image d where g.movie_id=d.movie_id and d.filetype='detail_image' and movie_status = 'y' order by g.movie_id desc) t where rowNum <16

select t.* from( select g.*,d.fileName from MOVIE_DETAILS g, movie_detail_image d where g.movie_id=d.movie_id and d.filetype='detail_image' and movie_status = 'e' order by g.movie_id desc) t where rowNum <16
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE_ORDER( MORDER_SEQ_NUM, MEMBER_ID, MOVIE_ID, MOVIE_PRICE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_PLACE, MOVIE_SEAT_NUMBER, MOVIE_PEOPLE_QTY, MOVIE_FILENAME, PAY_METHOD, CARD_COM_NAME, CARD_NUMBER, CARD_PAY_MONTH, ORDERD_AGE, PAY_ORDERER_HP_NUM, TICKET_NUMBER, movie_screening_date, movie_running_time ) VALUES( MORDER_SEQ_NUM.nextval, #{member_id}, #{movie_id}, #{movie_price}, #{movie_title}, #{movie_place}, #{movie_seat_number}, #{movie_people_qty}, null, #{pay_method}, #{card_com_name}, #{card_number}, #{card_pay_month}, #{orderd_age}, #{pay_orderer_hp_num}, #{ticket_number}, #{movie_screening_date}, #{movie_running_time} )
mapper.select: select movie_id from movie_details where movie_title = #{movie_title}
